text: "With or Without You" is a 1987 song by Irish rock group U2. It is the leading single from their fifth studio album The Joshua Tree and went to number 1 in the United States, Ireland and Canada, number 4 in the United Kingdom, number 9 in Australia, number 2 in the Netherlands, number 5 in Spain, New Zealand and Finland, number 10 in Switzerland and France and number 11 in South Africa. ==Track listing== == References == Category:1987 songs Category:1980s ballads Category:Rock ballads Category:U2 songs
title: With or Without You
